::Fliq::

The grab caught Fliq complete unaware, the Maximal ending up looking 
at Strafe as he sat up. Fliq's hand moves his gun, pointing the 
barrel at Strafe.

"My name is Fliq," Fliq says as best as he could right now. "I'm a 
Maximal. We found you in a crash site and repaired you, you're in our 
base."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kevin Ramsey <kramsey20@y...> wrote:
> 
> > The CR chamber beeps, reporting that it was done
> > with the repairing. 
> > Fliq takes his gun out, holding it ready as the CR
> > door opens. It had 
> > been set to put Strafe in stasis when he was
> > repaired, but something 
> > could have gone wrong.
> 
> All was peaceful as Fliq approached...
> 
> Then suddenly a robotic Decepticon hand shot up,
> grabbing him in a death grip around the throat. 
> 
> Strafe sat up, eyes glowing purple.
> 
> "Who are you and where am I?"
> 
> He squeezed tighter, dead serious. 
> 
> 
>
